name: FUNO
description:
FUNO is a fast-paced, exciting online card game inspired by the popular game UNO. Players pick their own cosmetics and then race to get rid of all their cards by matching them to the current card on the table by color or number. Players can also use special action cards to mix up the game and trip up their opponents. With easy-to-learn rules and endless potential for strategic play, FUNO is a game that brings quick fun to any situation.

 

FUNO! - Customize your gameplay with a ton of cosmetics and win effects, all for free!

- Annoy your friends using +4 cards or skips 

- Turn the lobby wild with custom server settings 

- AND MUCH MORE!!
